byline.contributor: Lizette Alvarez contributed reporting from Charleston, and Peter Baker from Washington.
byline.original: By KEVIN SACK and GARDINER HARRIS

abstract: Pres Obama gives impassioned eulogy for Rev Clementa C Pinckney, relating shooting at Charleston, SC, church to broader national history of violence against African-Americans and ending with soulful rendition of Amazing Grace; calls for Confederate flag to be removed from State House grounds in capital Columbia and for stricter gun laws.
lead_paragraph: The president invoked the concept of grace and began to sing “Amazing Grace.”

headline.main: President Obama Eulogizes Charleston Pastor as One Who Understood Grace
headline.print_headline: Obama Scorns Racism in Soaring, Singing Eulogy

snippet: The president invoked the concept of grace and began to sing “Amazing Grace.”

keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
keywords.name: organizations
